Docs.summary: Provides a base class for arguments for events dealing with a change in input language.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This class provides the base for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageChangedEventArgs> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageChangingEventArgs> classes, which in turn provide arguments for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguageChanged> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.InputLanguageChanging> routed events, respectively.
